body: Is this really CPU specific in any way? It looks like this one, `TensorDesc` and a few other structs are shared and we're unnecessarily duplicating code. Can you move them as a shared util to the `fusers` directory?
body_html: Is this really CPU specific in any way? It looks like this one, TensorDesc and a few other structs are shared and we're unnecessarily duplicating code. Can you move them as a shared util to the fusers directory?
